metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22183 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting with11.8. GitLab was vulnerable to a stored XSS in the epics page, which couldbe exploited with user interactions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
